description: This file defines the AppPreferences class responsible for managing application preferences related to user settings and last device info, using Android's SharedPreferences.

classes.name: AppPreferences
classes.description: Class managing app's shared preferences for user settings and last known device information.

methods.name: getSettings
methods.description: Retrieves user settings from preferences and returns a UserSettings object.

methods.name: setSettings
methods.description: Saves the provided UserSettings object to preferences.

methods.name: getLastDevice
methods.description: Returns the last connected device as DeviceSummary, if available.

methods.name: setLastDevice
methods.description: Stores or clears the last device information in preferences.
